name: Cook the Book: Pappardelle with Escarole
description: Today's recipe from Nigella Express is for a super easy pappardelle with escarole dish. I've always liked the mixture of a sharp green like escarole along with pasta, and this recipe couldn't be any easier to make than boiling water...
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chile, seeded and finely chopped (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Put a large pot of water over high heat, and start bringing it to a boil. Meanwhile, in a wide pan, heat the oil gently with the dried chile flakes. Add the escarole, stirring it to wilt in the oil.
Add the wine and water; partially cover pan, letting escarole cook for about 6 minutes. Set pasta in the boiling water.
